physical_appearance:The light measuring probe is predominantly black in colour
 with a silver-surfaced screen. Below the screen
 the name of the company
 \u0027Paterson\u0027
 and the model of the device
 \u0027PDB 2053\u0027
 are displayed. There is a rotating button with several numerals around its circumference. A wire with a probe is connected from the base of measuring device.

sgcool_label_text:The light measure probe is used during photographic film processing. This is part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm
 which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.

metadata.physical_appearance: The light measuring probe is predominantly black in colour, with a silver-surfaced screen. Below the screen, the name of the company, 'Paterson', and the model of the device, 'PDB 2053', are displayed. There is a rotating button with several numerals around its circumference. A wire with a probe is connected from the base of measuring device.
